overview: A live recording of Mark Lowry's stand-up comedy. Recorded at the beautiful Tivoli Theatre in Chattanooga, TN, Mark Lowry takes you through a series of gut-busting funny stories and songs â€” and even shows you how a Baptist dances!  Program: 1.  If Your Heart Belongs To Jesus 2.  Presbyterian Baptismal 3.  Praying To A Single Adult 4.  Baby Why Not Me 5.  The New Dentist 6.  The Old Sanctuary 7.  All Mama Ever Wanted 8.  The Last Word 9.  Fritzy & Helen Hanft 10. I Know, I Know 11. Flying With A Baby 12. Life Backwards 13. Rest In The Arms 14. For Just A Glimpse Of You 15. If Your Heart Belongs To Jesus (Reprise)
title: Mark Lowry: The Last Word
